message.welcomeplayer.beacon.need_batter: A battery is required to activate.
message.welcomeplayer.beacon.no_event: This beacon has no purpose right now.
commands.welcomeplayer.objective.get: [Welcomeplayer] The objective is %s, with progression at %s.
commands.welcomeplayer.interest.add: [Welcomeplayer] %s was added to the audience interest, it is now %s
death.welcomeplayer.damage.laser: %1$s was vaporised by extreme sci-fi energy
death.welcomeplayer.damage.saw: %1$s was torn apart by violent saw blades
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.dog_perso: Let's try something a little simpler.
Aren't the contestants kind of loners?
Why not get them a best friend?
Find yourselves a wolf to tame, they would be so cute for the younger audience!
objective.welcomeplayer.rationing: Deposit food worth %1$s points of hunger in any Material Transit.
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.rationing: The world the contestants inhabit have such a unique variety of food.
Lets have them send it over to us shall we!
Bring us your food! If it isn't good, we'll give it to the soldiers as rations.
objective.welcomeplayer.carniferous_crow: Deposit food worth %1$s points of hunger in any Material Transit.
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.carnifero: Food sells folks! Especially lots of it!
Audience, don't we want to see more cuisine!
You hear that? The audience HUNGRY!
Send a lot of food over through the material transits!
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.cat_perso: I've heard that cats are a popular cat to have nowadays.
In honesty... I've never seen one before!
Why don't you demonstrate to m... US what they are like!
Go out there and tame us a cat!
objective.welcomeplayer.coal_miner: Deposit %1$s coal in any Material Transit.
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.coal_mine: I've gotten a message from the ministry of energy.
They have told me their coal supplies are low.
I think our contestants are quite experienced in coal mining wouldn't you say?
Get us some coal. We need it more than you do.
objective.welcomeplayer.rich_display: Deposit %1$s diamonds in any Material Transit.
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.rich_disp: Luxury may not be attainable by the large audience.
But for our contenders, they can give us a look into new luxuries!
Show us what precious gems you have, and give us a sample!
The audience wants to know (and will pay us handsomely)!
The audience is quite unfamiliar with these new lands.
Activate the beacons found around the world.
For the audience at home, they look like orange boxes with antennas.
I hope they remember to bring a battery! They'll need them!
Let's learn some geography shall we kids?.
Parents... time to get your child's attention.
We are gonna learn more about this mysterious world our contestants live in!
Contestants! We will need more activated beacons for the lovely children.
Do your job and activate them for us!
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.zombie_ki: Their world has such flattering monsters. Especially those zombies.
The audience wants them removed with extreme prejudice!
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.monster_h: There are a lot of monsters on this world.
Most of them are with you! Hahaha!
SO KILL THEM FOR US! SHED MONSTER BLOOD!
I'll toss a coin for your services!
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.duck_hunt: Those clucking feathered birds are all over the place.
And I've heard you are quite good poachers.
Lets have Thanksgiving early shall we!
Go get us some chickens for the harvest!
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.the_sheph: You shall be the the great shepherds for the audience!
And by that I mean you will kill animals!
So like an actual shepherd but with a violent bloodlust.
So not like one at all.
There is nothing you could shepherd us anyway haha.
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.pest_cont: GET IT AWAY! GET IT AWA-
Ahem. The audience finds these bugs in your world disgusting.
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.the_butch: Ladies and Gentlemen! Aren't you curious about this world's wildlife?
Want to see whats inside that tall fluffy animal over there?
Contestants, do us a favour and kill your fuzzy creatures for us!
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.metal_ros: How do your iron behemoths work?
Are they powered by energy? Magic?
Why not destroy some for us? Their death may give us some insight!
Our scientists would love to study your little metal friends!
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.set_battl: What we crave most is WAR!
We LOVE WAR! Don't we kids?
We will send the contestants some fun little toys.
SO RIP THEM APART WILL YAAA!
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.pure_viol: Go out and TEAR EVERYTHING THAT BLEEDS
We are gonna make this a BLOODBATH!
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.goliath.0: The Eradicator Mk.II are incredibly robust.
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.goliath.1: Laser-tech attached arm with a sharp-molded buzz-saw attachment.
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.goliath.2: The army wants to see how strong it is, and we have strong testers!
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.goliath.3: This is getting exciting folks! Our contestants faced off a GOLIATH!
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.night_kil: There has been gossiping sturring around about a horrid creature.
One that stalks in the dark, sniffing around looking for its next victim.
One that bellows a loud cry and moves by sound.
The Warden. Find it and kill it for us. Show us this creature's power.
objective.welcomeplayer.forced_resupply: Deposit %1$s Retrosteel Ores in any Material Transit.
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.forced_re: It seems our contestants are no good for a crowd
So instead, lets put them to work!
We need a massive resupply of some Retrosteel.
You have been nothing but BORING so CHOP CHOP!
objective.welcomeplayer.day_labour: Deposit %1$s Retrosteel Ores in any Material Transit.
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.day_labou: I've always wondered "Hey. We have plenty strong able contestants here."
"Why not put them into good use other than entertainment?"
Go out and find us some of our precious ore Retrosteel.
Lets put those able hands to work!
objective.welcomeplayer.short_fuse: Deposit %1$s batteries in any Material Transit.
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.short_fus: Those batteries from the robot's aren't free you know!
Wouldn't it be nice to have them back?
The contestants should fetch us our batteries!
objective.welcomeplayer.human_charger: Deposit %1$s batteries in any Material Transit.
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.human_cha: Ladies and Gentlemen! These contestants are always so powered up!
Always ready to put in that energy towards destroying rocks!
Why not let them deposit some of that energy for us!
objective.welcomeplayer.wonder_eggs: Deposit %1$s golden apples in any Material Transit.
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.wonder_eg: There is this magical egg that exists in this world.
Glows a golden hue and can cure disease just by eating it!
A miracle food to the unfortunate!
The audience must see it for themselves!
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.demolitio: Explosions! Why not cause some unnecessary destruction?
Show us what your little boom gadgets can do!
Maybe if your good enough, you might be part of our demolition crew!
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.destructi: We are lacking some chaos and destruction!
Give the audience a big boom! One of your best!
We want some chaos on catastrophic levels!
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.pain.0: We do not condone the acts of harming one's self for the entertainment of others.
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.pain.1: But we can see it as building ones physical character!
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.pain.2: The audience wants to see how tolerant you are of yourself!
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.pain.3: We want to see you break limits!
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.suffering: The ultimate character building is through great suffering!
Show us what your bodies can do under extreme pressure!
We want to learn your ancient ways, for our entertainment!
dialog.welcomeplayer.objective.cruel_suf: Many of them wish the contestants were dead!
Even though we can't allow that directly (for legal reasons)!
We can do something to sedate their bloodthirst!
dialog.welcomeplayer.event.big_boss.furi: We are happy to say we will be bringing out a real crowd pleaser!
By popular request (and audience hatred) we are bringing out the ERADICATOR!
This could be the end for them folks!
dialog.welcomeplayer.event.big_boss.thri: It is a fight to the death folks!
Today you will witness a battle to the death!
A great behemoth marches towards our contestants!
This will be a fight for true survival! A grand test!
Will they survive the deadly clutches of the ERADICATOR?!
dialog.welcomeplayer.event.sad_rain.bore: Its honestly been not very eventful recently.
As such we have decided to deploy some relaxing rain.
Be careful, you might get sick!
dialog.welcomeplayer.event.sad_rain.neut: Let the serene rain wash away your pain...
The relaxing noise of water hitting the ground...
The feeling of sad (drug-induced) sorrow landing on your skin...
dialog.welcomeplayer.event.sad_rain.inte: Oh no! A tragedy has struck!
Cue sad rain onto the world!
And lace it with sad serum!
The horde has come with the collective anger of our audience today!
Their fury will be put in their empty souls and consume you all!
And they are bored out of their miiiinnndss!
The apocalypse has come! The zombies are here!
Barricade your homes! Hide your children!
dialog.welcomeplayer.event.raiding_party: The wrath of the audience has come for you all!
We are sending a raiding party to destroy all your villages!
Feels like everything is slowing down?
Turns out there are people in this world that like a little chaos!
After some fair compensation, they were quite willing to go raid some places!
This should add a bit of excitement!
dialog.welcomeplayer.event.toxic_rain.bo: It seems rather dreary today folks.
Oh goodness its VERY DREARY, watch out for the rain! Its TOXIC!
dialog.welcomeplayer.event.toxic_rain.th: WAIT WAIT DON'T DROP THAT VAT OF POISON IN YOU IDIOT!
dialog.welcomeplayer.event.commercial_br: Nothing much is happening with the contestants.
So lets take a quick commercial break folks!
Be sure to get your hands on Bilbo's new Burger Combo!
Now with 50% more plasma used in every bite!
And now a word from our sponsors!
Don't mind the popups, its just your contestant policy!
Did you know 60% of our revenue comes from these ads.
Good thing you get to see them, not a penny wasted!
The audience is getting bored, so lets make it more interesting!
We are sending some Handibot hot on pursuit!
Oh no! Looks like some Handibots have gone rogue!
Not really, but play along will yeah?
Here comes a patrol now! Look out!
The contestants have gotten themselves in trouble with the mob bots!
The Handimen have come to collect their due!
Will the contestants be able to fend them off their collectors?
dialog.welcomeplayer.event.fast_food.neu: You know what everyone can't resist? Some good old CHICKEN!
So come on folks! Lets send these guys SOME CHICKEN shall we?
dialog.welcomeplayer.event.fast_food.int: What did you say folks? MORE CHICKENS?!
You have been looking kind of lost.
Lets send over some service bots to help them out shall we?
I think these guys need a little more service don't you think?
Lets give them a welcoming hand to get them on their journey!
dialog.welcomeplayer.event.bomb_squad.fu: Looks like the crowd is really displeased with these contestants.
So of them are asking us to blow you up?!
We couldn't POSSIBLY DO THAT right guys?
dialog.welcomeplayer.event.bomb_squad.bo: Alright we need to spice this up.
Get ready because we are sending in the bomb squad!
dialog.welcomeplayer.event.bomb_squad.in: So lets take it up a notch!
Don't we all want to see things blow up?!
dialog.welcomeplayer.event.nuclear_squad: You know whats more fun than watching our stupid contestants grab their tails?
WATCHING THEM EXPLODE AT AN ATOMIC LEVEL (by popular request)!
Can our contestants survive crazy bombs ON LEGS!
dialog.welcomeplayer.event.roaring_thund: Lighting blasts from the heavens! To show the gods pain!
In this case, the AUDIENCE'S PAIN!
The stakes are getting higher folks!
The cloud's sink into the land! Lightning falls from the sky!
Drowned pull themselves from the lakes!
Oh how will our contestants get through this all!
